title: STANLEY S1007 Black/Yellow 1.5" x 16' Ratchet Tie Down Straps - Heavy Cargo Securing (3,300 lbs Break Strength), 2 Pack
description: The Stanley 2-Pack Ratchet Tie-Down Kit is perfect for heavy cargo securing , including motorcycle, medium-sized industrial UTV, small tractor, or machinery, or agricultural equipment in a truck bed or trailer. Safely secure loads to your car roof like a canoe or kayak, or smaller items in the back of the car. These 1" by 16' weather-resistant webbed straps feature an ergonomically designed handle with angular grip and durable ratcheting component to easily and safely secure cargo and keep loads from shifting.
